author: max
name: Holiday
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. Note you need an api key to use the cog, see `[p]holidayset setkey` for information.
<https://cogs.maxapp.tv/> for documentations.
If you enjoy my work, you can donate at [buymeacoffee](<https://buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: Display holidays for countries worldwide, with support for setting a default country and listing available countries.
short: Display holidays for countries worldwide, with support for setting a default country and listing available countries.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
